short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OPFS Viewer is a original private file system viewer extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
OPFS Viewer Chrome DevTools extension offers a user-friendly interface for navigating and interacting with the Origin Private File System (OPFS). 

To utilize this feature, access Chrome DevTools and navigate to the OPFS Viewer tab. Upon selection, the extension will promptly examine the OPFS of the current web application, presenting you with a structured file hierarchy. From there, you have the option to download the contents of any file or initiate its deletion (although deletion may be unsuccessful if the file is locked). It's important to note that removing files could potentially disrupt the application's functionality, so proceed with caution.

Contacts:
https://github.com/InsecureBeast/opfs-viewer
